content.title: CLTI Definition
content.definition: Chronic limb-threatening ischemia (CLTI) is chronic ischemia with rest pain, ulcers, or gangrene for >2 weeks, requiring revascularization.
content.statement: CLTI Definition is a fundamental concept in Health-Sciences Medicine Surgery Vascular Pathology Pad that provides essential knowledge for understanding related topics and clinical/practical applications.
